original_title: 出張先のビジネスホテルでずっと憧れていた女上司とまさかまさかの相部屋宿泊 東凛
overview: I have been a smartphone maker for two years. Today, I am going on a day trip to a rural area with my longing eastern senior. I was on a business trip alone with a beautiful senior, but Higashi-senpai has a face that never floats ... And time for business talks. Perhaps I forgot the documents and canceled the transaction. I suddenly stayed overnight and decided to come back tomorrow ... The misfortune continues and the nearby hotels are full. I finally decided to stay alone in one vacant room I found ...
title: I Was On A Business Trip With My Favorite Lady Boss, And To My Surprise, We Ended Up Sharing A Room At The Business Hotel Rin Azuma
